name: Probability Drive (flightless games)
description:
Probability Drive

The task of closing the rigolith processing plant for the weekend fell on you.
Now you have to hurry to the last space elevator that leaves before the weekend.

Controls 
- Arrow keys 
- Space

Playing in Full Screen is recommended.

GMTK Game Jam 2022 - "Roll of the Dice"
Author: Flightless
All code, graphics and sound were created during the 48 hours. Team of one.
